property.name: Rules
property.value: {WAVE STRIKER} (While 2 or more other creatures in the battle zone have "Wave Striker" this creature has its Wave Striker ability.) Each of your creatures in the battle zone gets +5000 power and has "blocker" and "double breaker".

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, return all your other creatures from the battle zone to your hand. {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy the creature that has the lowest power in the battle zone. If there's a tie, you choose from among the tied creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ Vortex evolution—Put on one of your Fire Birds and one of your Earth Dragons. {TRIPLE BREAKER} ■ When this creature would leave the battle zone, only the top card leaves the battle zone instead. (Separate the other cards into 2 creatures.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, for each creature you have in the battle zone, you may choose a shield and turn it face up. (Those shields stay face up while they're in the shield zone.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Your opponent chooses one of your shields. Look at it. If it's a spell, you may cast it immediately for no cost. If it's not a spell or if you don't cast it, put it back where it was.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ This creature can't be attacked by fire or nature creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever your opponent would choose one of your shields, you choose instead. ■ Whenever you would choose one of your opponent's shields, your opponent chooses instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ At the end of each turn, if your opponent drew 2 or more cards that turn, he discards his hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {WAVE STRIKER} (While 2 or more other creatures in the battle zone have "Wave Striker" this creature has its Wave Striker ability.) When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy all creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever another creature is put into the battle zone, tap this creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Choose a number less than or equal to 6000. Destroy all creatures that have that power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ This creature gets +2000 power for each card in your opponent's hand. ■ While this creature has power 6000 or more, it has "double breaker (This creature breaks 2 shields)."

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ Evolution—Put on one of your Gladiators or Earth Eaters. ■ Each of your other Gladiators and Earth Eaters in the battle zone gets +2000 power. ■ Whenever one of your Gladiators or Earth Eaters blocks, you may draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ Evolution—Put on one of your Cyber Lords or Hedrians. ■ Each of your other Cyber Lords and Hedrians in the battle zone gets +2000 power. ■ Your Cyber Lords and Hedrians can't be blocked.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ Evolution—Put on one of your Chimeras or Armorloids. ■ Each of your other Chimeras and Armorloids in the battle zone gets +2000 power. ■ Each of your Chimeras and Armorloids in the battle zone has "double breaker." (A creature that has "double breaker" breaks 2 shields.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ Evolution—Put on one of your Xenoparts or Giant Insects. ■ Each of your other XenoParts and Giant Insects in the battle zone gets +2000 power. ■ Whenever any of your XenoParts or Giant Insects is attacking your opponent and isn't blocked, your opponent chooses a card in his mana zone and puts it into his graveyard.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ Evolution—Put on one of your Wild Veggies or Rainbow Phantoms. ■ Each of your other Wild Veggies and Rainbow Phantoms in the battle zone gets +2000 power. ■ At the end of each of your turns, you may untap any number of your Wild Veggies and Rainbow Phantoms in the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ This creature can't attack players.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this spell is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may cast it immediately for no cost.) ■ Choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. Then, for each 'Cloned Deflector' in each graveyard, you may choose another of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone. Tap all those creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Choose a creature in the battle zone. Then, for each 'Cloned Spiral' in each graveyard, you may choose another creature in the battle zone. Return all those creatures to their owners' hands.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Discard any number of cards from your hand. Then draw that many cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SHIELD TRIGGER} (When this creature is put into your hand from your shield zone, you may summon it immediately for no cost.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, your opponent discards a card at random from his hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Choose a card at random in your opponent's hand. Then, for each 'Cloned Nightmare' in each graveyard, you may choose another card at random in your opponent's hand. Your opponent discards all those cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ This creature can attack untapped creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Choose one of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone that has power 3000 or less. Then, for each 'Cloned Blade' in each graveyard, you may choose another of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone that has power 3000 or less. Destroy all those creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever you draw the card at the start of your turn, if one of your creatures in the battle zone has higher power then each of your opponent's creatures in the battle zone, you may draw an extra card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ This creature gets +3000 power for each 'Cloned Spike-Horn' in each graveyard. ■ While this creature has power 6000 or more, it has "double breaker (This creature breaks 2 shields)."

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.)

property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.)

property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.)

property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.)

property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When this creature would be discarded from your hand during your opponent's turn, you may put it into the battle zone instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose a darkness or fire creature in the battle zone and tap it.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ Whenever an opponent's creature attacks, this creature blocks if able. ■ This creature can't attack players.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When this creature is destroyed, you may return a spell from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ Whenever this creature blocks, your opponent chooses one of his creatures in the battle zone and returns it to his hand. ■ This creature can't attack.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, each player may draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, draw up to 2 cards. Then discard 2 cards from your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, return one of your creatures that costs 4 or less from the battle zone to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, your opponent draws a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, your may return a water or fire creature from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever this creature attacks, your opponent discards a card at random from his hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {BLOCKER} (You may tap this creature to change the attack target of your opponent's creature to this creature.) {SLAYER} (Whenever this creature battles, destroy the other creature after the battle.) ■ This creature can't attack.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {WAVE STRIKER} (While 2 or more other creatures in the battle zone have "Wave Striker" this creature has its Wave Striker ability.) When you put this creature is put into battle zone, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power 5000 or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {SPEED ATTACKER} (This creature doesn't get summoning sickness.) {POWER ATTACKER} +4000 (While attacking, this creature gets +2000 power.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: {POWER ATTACKER} +3000 (While attacking, this creature gets +2000 power.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever another creature is put into the battle zone, tap this creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ When a player evolves another creature, destroy this creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Whenever your opponent uses the "shield trigger" ability of one of his shields, search your deck. You may take a creature from your deck, show that creature to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ Your creatures and your opponent's creatures each cost up to 1 less to summon. They can't cost less than 1.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {WAVE STRIKER} (While 2 or more other creatures in the battle zone have "Wave Striker" this creature has its Wave Striker ability.) When you put this creature into the battle zone, put the top card of your deck into your mana zone. Then put a creature from your mana zone into your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When this creature would be discarded from your hand during your opponent's turn, you may put it into the battle zone instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ Vortex evolution—Put on one of your Light Bringers and one of your Cyber Lords. ■ Whenever this creature attacks or leaves the battle zone, add the top card of your deck to your shields face down. {DOUBLE BREAKER}

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ Vortex evolution—Put on one of your Merfolk and one of your Chimeras. ■ This creature can't be blocked. {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ When this creature leaves the battle zone, destroy all creatures.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ Vortex evolution—Put on one of your Zombie Dragons and one of your Fire Birds. {DOUBLE BREAKER} ■ Whenever this creature would break a shield, your opponent puts that shield into his graveyard instead. ■ When this creature leaves the battle zone, your opponent discards his hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ■ (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped.) ■ Vortex evolution—Put on one of your Horned Beasts and one of your Angel Commands. ■ Whenever this creature attacks or leaves the battle zone, reveal the top card of your deck. If it's a non-evolution creature, put it into the battle zone. Otherwise, put it into your hand. {TRIPLE BREAKER}
